abstract: Driven by concerns that are as much political as they are environmental, the company will offer a hybrid version of its Cayenne sport utility vehicle by the end of the decade.
snippet: Driven by concerns that are as much political as they are environmental, the company will offer a hybrid version of its Cayenne sport utility vehicle by the end of the decade.
lead_paragraph: WEISSACH, Germany, July 26  Nobody is ever going to mistake a Porsche for a Prius. But Porsche, the celebrated German sports car maker, is hoping to blur the line between its gas-guzzling, carbon-spewing speedsters and the environmentally conscious hybrids produced by Toyota.

headline.main: Porsche Designs an S.U.V. for the Environmentally Conscious
headline.print_headline: Porsche Designs an S.U.V. for the Environmentally Conscious
